Welcome!

This fine system handles a lot of the grunt work of maintaining Cisco's OpenStack edition. It

  • controls build infrastructure,
  • keeps track of patches that we have that upstream doesn't,
  • keeps track of patches that upstream has that we don't,
  • keeps track of security updates in Ubuntu that we need to pull into our packages,
  • etc.
It's supposed to make your life easier, so if you want to add more stuff to it, get in touch!

Learn more »
